mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_investor (investor_id, name, password, created_time, modified_time) VALUES (#{investorId}, #{name}, #{password}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_investor SET name = #{name}, password = #{password}, modified_time = now() WHERE investor_id = #{investorId}
mapper.select: SELECT investor_no , investor_id , name , password , modified_time , created_time FROM tb_investor WHERE admin_id = #{adminId}
